page.title: 01A Day In The Life Of A Child
page.content: Stuart Barber.(11yrs.) At 7.15 I woke up and switched the T.V. on.After watching for about 30 minutes I went downstairs and had breakfast. For breakfast I had a boiled egg and strips of toast. At 8.30 we went to the shop and I helped set the shop up. I loaded the rubbish into the van. Then I went to Taylor's to get the papers. At 10 AM I went to Nan's for dinner. For dinner I had a bun, baked beans and chips. Then we watched TV till 5.05 PM when Mum came for my sister and I. When we got home cousin Phil was there and we worked on the computer. Then Phil went for his tea and I had mine. We had new potatoes, chops and cauliflower. Then Phil and I played soccer for a while. Phil went home. I watched TV and went to bed.
